info.title: cisco-bridge-domain - RPC Operations
info.description:
This YANG module describes the configuration and operational
     model for bridge domain.

     Terms and Acronyms
       AC : Attachment Circuits

       BD : Bridge Domain

       BCB : Backbone Core Bridge

       BEB : Backbone Edge Bridge

       B-MAC : Backbone MAC Address

       CE : Customer Edge

       C-MAC : Customer/Client MAC Address

       DHCP : Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol

       DAI : Dynamic ARP Inspection

       EVC : Ethernet Virtual Circuit

       IGMP : Internet Group Management Protocol

       IPSG : IP Source Guard

       L2VPN : Layer 2 Virtual Private Network

       MLD : Multicast Listener Discovery

       PBB : Provider Backbone Bridge

       VLAN : Virtual Local Area Network
    

**Module:** `cisco-bridge-domain`
**Version:** 2019-07-01
**Operations:** 3

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View cisco-bridge-domain structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/cisco-bridge-domain.html)

post.summary:
Clear mac-address table for bridge-domain and allows a bridge
       to forward again after it was put in shutdown state as a
       result of exceeding the configured MAC limit.
post.description:
Clear mac-address table for bridge-domain and allows a bridge
       to forward again after it was put in shutdown state as a
       result of exceeding the configured MAC limit.

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/cisco_bridge_domain:clear-bridge-domain`

all.description: Clear all bridge-domains configured on the device.

bg-id.description: Clears all bridge-domains under this bridge-group.

errstr.description: Error message from the device if RPC failed.

post.summary:
This RPC allows to clear dynamically learnt mac-address
       entries from the mac-address table.
post.description:
This RPC allows to clear dynamically learnt mac-address
       entries from the mac-address table.

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/cisco_bridge_domain:clear-mac-address`

bd-id.description:
Bridge-domain identifier, clear all mac-address entries
             dynamically learnt on this bridge-domain

bg-id.description:
Bridge-group identifier, clear all mac-address entries
             from all bridge-domains under this bridge-group.

interface.description:
Reference to an interface. Clear mac-addesses learnt by
           by this interface.

mac-address.description: Clear a specific mac-address entry from the mac-table.

bd-id.description:
Bridge-domain identifier, clear all mac-address entries
             dynamically learnt on this bridge-domain

bg-id.description:
Bridge-group identifier, clear all mac-address entries
             from all bridge-domains under this bridge-group.

bridge-domain.description: Clear mac-address entries for given bridge-domain(s).

errstr.description: Error message from the device if RPC failed.

post.summary:
Create bridge domains automatically from user defined
       parameters.
post.description:
Create bridge domains automatically from user defined
       parameters.

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/cisco_bridge_domain:create-parameterized-bridge-domains`

parameter.description:
Create bridge-domains from vlan encapsulations of the
               member interfaces.

interface.description:
Reference to an interface instance which is
             configured to be part of this bridge domain

errstr.description: Error message from the device if RPC failed.
